text:
Service for Businesses – Landeshauptstadt München search close search Enter search term start search Menu close menu navigation language City Hall Events Culture, Leisure Restaurants Shopping Sights Tourism Hotels Business Living Transportation Current language: English Deutsch Français Italiano Русский العربية 中文 Startseite City of Munich Service for Businesses City of Munich Service for Businesses You're looking to found a start-up oder build a company in Munich? Tools and guidance for entrepreneurs. Munich Business Development Discover information on Munich as a business location and offers for companies, founders and investors on our website munich-business.eu. munich-business.eu Events and Awards This is a carousel with rotating cards. Use the previous and next buttons to
                    navigate, and Enter to activate cards. Vorheriger Slide City of Munich Innovation Challenge Wanted: Innovative solutions and concepts to challenges specified by Munich's city administration ECOPROFIT More than 100 cities and more than 2.400 companies have successfully realised ECOPROFIT in Germany. Munich is taking the active part of counceling and giving advice. amiga - Career Center for Internationals amiga supports international professionals, graduates and students in starting their career in Munich – with coaching, trainings and contact to companies. Nächster Slide Information and Service Planning to set up a branch in Munich? The Point of Single Contact provides basic information to foreign companies planning to set up a branch in Munich. Business Licensing Office Any person operating a business, trade or any other commercial venture in Munich has to register at the Business Licensing Office (Gewerbebehörde). Lost & Found Office at the Oktoberfest If you have lost or found something on the Oktoberfest grounds, you will find all the information here. Labor Market Access The Munich Employment and Qualification Program (MBQ) offers migrants and refugees a broad range of free services as well as access to the labor market. Munich Employment and Qualification The MBQ is the City of Munich’s labor market program. Aim is to professionally, socially integrate people into the labor market, acquire and retain skilled workers. 慕尼黑 - 您的一流选择. 我们乐意为您提供支持. 慕尼黑对中资企业特别有吸引力，尤其是对高科技和服务领域的企业。 International schools A growing number of bilingual schools and nurseries serve the needs of international families.
